Origin 'http://127.0.0.1:8000' is therefore not allowed access.

Origin 'http://127.0.0.1:8000' is therefore not allowed access.

Origin 'http://127.0.0.1:8000' is therefore not allowed access.

Origin 'http://127.0.0.1:8000' is therefore not allowed access.
Testing the handling of CORS-enabled

PASS: Anonymous request: no-CORS => no-CORS script resource.
